articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website and inpiration behind it
articles.contents:
About Me
My name is Oliver Altindag, I am a student at Newton North HS who is Liverpool FC super fan. You’ll Never Walk Alone!
About the Project
My project, Liverpool Football Clubs Best Statistical 11, explores the statistics of Liverpool Football Club’s most succesfull domestic season.
Goals
To establish an understanding of Liverpool FC’s best players most important stats
To figure out how Liverpool FC can improve
The fitness of the squad limits these decisions

To see how accurately statistics represent player performances
“You’ll Never Walk Alone”
Gerry & the Pacemakers

You’ll Never Walk alone

articles.title: Liverpool Football Clubs Best Statistical Eleven
articles.description:
The in-depth rundown of Liverpool Football Club's
players and corresponding statistics.
articles.contents:
Goalkeeper
The first step to creating our starting eleven is the goalkeeper and arguably our most important position.



Goalkeeper: Alisson
Defenders
Liverpool FC will need four defensive minded players to protect the newly selected goalkeeper Alisson.



Defenders: Trent Alexander-Arnold, Virgil Van Dijk, Jordan Henderson, and Fabinho
Midfielders
The heart of all teams is the midfield and their ability to dribble the ball, Liverpool FC will need three of them.



Midfielders: Curtis Jones, Joel Matip, and Naby Keita
Attackers
The firepower of Liverpool FC and the goalscorers of any team.



Attackers: Mohamed Salah, Roberto Firmino, and Sadio Mane
Final Eleven
Alisson, Fabinho, Virgil Van Dijk, Jordan Henderson, Trent Alexander-Arnold, Curtis Jones, Joel Matip, Naby Keita, Mohamed Salah, Roberto Firmino, Sadio Mane
